meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of albinism.
meanings.sent1: The albinal skin of the rabbit made it stand out in the snow.
meanings.sent2: Her albinal hair and pale eyes were typical traits of albinism.
meanings.sent3: The albinal cat looked like a fluffy cloud with its white fur.
meanings.sent4: The albinal flowers in the garden seemed to glow in the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The albinal feathers of the swan shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A person or animal affected by albinism.
meanings.sent1: The albinal squirrel had red eyes and white fur.
meanings.sent2: She had never seen an albinal bird until that day at the park.
meanings.sent3: The albinal puppy was so cute with its pink nose and light fur.
meanings.sent4: The albinal deer stood out in the forest like a ghost.
meanings.sent5: The albinal rabbit hopped gracefully through the meadow.
